column4: hrdwr_BoB: yesterday I asked you about screen res (I could only get 1024, not 1280). FYI I have fixed this by re-installing and picking the correct res during setup! thanks.
you should be able change this by doing   sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xfree86
although thanks for reminding us that it's actually easier for most people to just reinstall...
i tried nut it didn't work... re-install was drastic but did the job!
